entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 4:03AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND LOCALIZED AREAS OF BLOWING AND DRIFTING SNOW THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY... Northeast winds will steadily strengthen across the Matanuska Valley today and then peak late tonight into Wednesday afternoon. Wind gusts are expected to reach 40 to 50 mph late tonight and Wednesday before starting to diminish some Wednesday night.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 3:17AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS DEVELOPING WITH SNOW AND BLOWING SNOW CHANGING TO RAIN THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TONIGHT... A strong low pressure system is poised to move along the Aleutian Chain today before entering the southern Bering Sea tonight into Wednesday.
